section.gemsIntroTitle: Atrani: 0.2 km² Between the Mountains and the Sea
section.gemsIntroText: A compact town compressed into just 0.2 km², set between Monte Aureo and Monte Civita and opening directly onto the sea. We live here, and this is a curated introduction to the places that define daily life in Atrani beyond its size.
section.expertGuideText: A personally curated selection of the best spots, hidden gems, and authentic flavors on the Amalfi Coast from someone who moved here years ago and fell in love with the place.
